parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Reset to factory settings
parameter.description: Set all configuration values to default values (factory settings).

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: The way how the button reacts when press/released
parameter.description: The way how the button reacts when press/released

options.option: Toggle light when button is pressed, no action when button is released.
Toggle light when button is released, Start dimming when button pressed.
Toggle light when button is pressed and when button is Released, start dimming when quickly press and release button.

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: The way the Built-in Dimmer reacts when light is turned on/off with button
parameter.description: The way the Built-in Dimmer reacts when light is turned on/off with button

options.option: Switch own light on and send a Z-Wave message to all associated nodes (direct and extern)
Don.t switch own light on but only send a Z-Wave message to associated node. (extern only).

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Enable dimming
parameter.description: This parameter is used to enable the dimming option of the product. When disabled the dimming and fading routine are disabled.

parameter.name: config_6_2
parameter.label: 6: Maximum load
parameter.description: The maximum powerload in watts when light is turned on, when measured higher then this value the Inline Dimmer is automatically turned off.

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: Dimming speed
parameter.description: The speed of dimming when activated (manual and RF). Dim speed is 1% per value (* 10 ms)

parameter.name: config_15_1
parameter.label: 15: Fading down speed
parameter.description: The speed of fading when activated (manual and RF). Fade speed is 1% per value (* 10 ms)

parameter.name: config_8_1
parameter.label: 8: Fading up speed
parameter.description: The speed of fading when activated (manual and RF). Fade speed is 1% per value (* 10 ms)

parameter.name: config_9_1
parameter.label: 9: Toggle time
parameter.description: The time window to repress button to start dimming. Toggle time is value (* 10ms)

parameter.name: config_11_1
parameter.label: 11: Auto meter report: percentage
parameter.description: A percentage that an energy value must be different compared to a previous sent value before an unsolicited meter report is sent. Minimum value = 10% Maximum value = 100%

parameter.name: config_12_1
parameter.label: 12: Auto meter report: watt
parameter.description: A watt value that an energy value must be different compared to a previous sent value before an unsolicited meter report is sent. Minimum value = 5 watt Maximum value = 255 watt

parameter.name: config_13_1
parameter.label: 13: Auto meter report: time
parameter.description: A time value that has to be passed compared to a previous sent value before a unsolicited meter report is sent. Minimum value = 10 seconds Maximum value = 255 seconds

parameter.name: config_14_1
parameter.label: 14: Last known status
parameter.description: What to do with lamp status when power applied. If 0x00: Always switch light off when power applied. If > 0x00: Switch lamp on/off depending on last known lampstatus before power was disconnected.

parameter.name: wakeup_interval
parameter.label: Wakeup Period
parameter.description: Set the wakeup period in seconds

parameter.name: wakeup_node
parameter.label: Wakeup Node
parameter.description: The node to which wakeup messages will be sent
